When defined, it overrides any + other label definition set by the OWNERS at any level in any project. + + Example: + + ``` + [owners] + label = Code-Review, 1 + ``` owners.enableSubmitRequirement : If set to `true` the approvals are evaluated through the owners plugin ```

-  owner(Path, User),
-  code_review_user(User),

   !.

Added the detection and reload of secure.config changes as well: when adding new destinations you may have set the associated credentials to reach it.

Does not make sense to reload the replication.config without checking secure.config as well, that's why I collapsed the additional amendments to this change.

Works nicely for me :-)

Patch Set 12: Code-Review+1

Code looks OK but I think it's better that we also do some testing before merging it.

Patch Set 12:

(that's not to say I don't believe Luca's Verified+1 score; I just mean we should also test it on our env a bit.)

Patch Set 12:

@David: agreed.

Does any other 'replication' user like this fix and check it out ? Do you want to play with it ?

Luca.

Patch Set 12: Verified+1

I tested it and basic use cases works fine, I didn't do exhaustive testing but I suppose Luca did.

Patch Set 12:

This fix is running on GerritHub.io replication and has been working fine for around 1 month ... all the issues have been fixed in the latest patch-sets.
Patch Set 14: Commit message was updated

Patch Set 15: Verified+1 Code-Review+1

Any more comments before I merge this?

Patch Set 15: Code-Review+1

Looks good to me
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.
